attributes.action: Allow the country to vote on Brexit now that its cost is clear
attributes.additional_details:
Cambridge Analytica whistleblower Chris Wylie has said the UK lacks a “democratic mandate” for leaving Europe in the wake of revelations about the Brexit campaign’s alleged links to data harvesting - Huffpost 08/04/18
BoE Governor Mark Carney has said Brexit explains the weak growth in investment in Britain - Reuters 27/02/18
A coalition of leading environmental groups says there is a “significant risk” that British environmental protections will be reduced after Brexit - Observer 21/1/18
attributes.background: We now know that the Leave campaign over-promised the benefits of Brexit. We know Leave.EU broke the law and Cambridge Analytica manipulated the vote. We realise the social, environmental and financial cost to the country will be catastrophic. Over a million young people now eligible want their say
